text: Imana niyo ikingira bamwe bayemeye bimwe vy’ukuri, kuko niyo ibakura mumwijima n’ukubinjiza mumuco wayo, mugabo abahakanye Imana yabo yukuri, ababakingira muvyabo n’amashetani, kuko niyo ibakura mu muco w’Imana ikabinjiza mumwijima, abo nibo bantu bomumuriro udahera, kuko muriwo niho hazoba ubwicaro bwabo bwa misi yose
